content.new:
We have had an issue where one user had previously ran Gazebo, which left a file: 
``/tmp/gz_model.tar.gz`` around. It looks like gazebo does not clean up this file after downloading a model from the web. 

This was preventing any subsequent user from
content.old:
We have had an issue where one user had previously ran Gazebo, which left a file: 
``/tmp/gz_model.tar.gz`` around. I'm not sure if gazebo normally cleans it up and was killed when it happend, or if gazebo just doesn't clean up this file. 

Either way

issue.title: Using /tmp/gz_model.tar.gz Is not friendly for multi-user systems
